dcterms:creator: A. Przepiórkowski
M. Bańko
R. L. Górski
B. Lewandowska-Tomaszczyk
dcterms:description: The NKJP1M subcorpus of the Polish National Corpus is manually annotated according to the NKJP tagset and modified in line with the Morfeusz tagset. This balanced subset of thematic- and genre-diverse texts and transcriptions is used to train Polish POS taggers.
dcterms:title: NKJP1M

dcterms:creator: A. Wróblewska
dcterms:description: Polish Dependency Bank is the largest collection of Polish sentences manually annotated with dependency trees and converted into UD representations in line with the UD annotation schema. It is typically used to train NLPre systems for Polish.
dcterms:title: PDB-UD

dcterms:creator: M. Shen
R. McDonald
D. Zeman
dcterms:description: Chinese Dependency Treebank is a collection of Chinese sentences annotated with dependency structures, following the Universal Dependencies framework.
dcterms:title: UD_Chinese-GSD

dcterms:creator: M. de Marneffe
C. D. Manning
J. Nivre
D. Zeman
dcterms:description: Universal Dependencies is a framework for cross-linguistic syntactic annotation, providing a consistent set of guidelines for annotating dependency structures across multiple languages.
dcterms:title: Universal Dependencies (UD)
